name: Gold Twig Baguette Ring
description:
Cast from a little twig found along the Dorset coast from one of our long walks in Spring 2013. Crafted in Sterling Silver and coated in 22ct Yellow Gold. 

This listing is for ONE ring only. There are 3 different stone options, please specify your selection when ordering:

- Pink Tourmaline
- Red Garnet
- Dark Blue Sapphire 

Please select your ring size from the option menu. 

Made to Order, please allow up to 7 working days for production prior to shipping.

name: Darling Bud Ring
description:
Cast from a bud plucked from a tree in Victoria Park, London in May 2013  these rings are available in Sterling Silver or 22ct Gold Plated Silver. 

This listing is for ONE ring only, please specify which colour you want when you order. This ring is adjustable by about 1 size up or down, but for a more accurate fit please select your ring size from the option menu. 

Made to Order, please allow up to 5 working days for production prior to shipping.

name: Initial Ring in Silver and 9ct Gold
description:
One of our best selling designs, these rings are hand formed in sterling silver and 9ct yellow gold or rose gold. A letter of your choice will be hand stamped to personalise this ring.

Each 'nugget' is hand pierced without a template, so each ring is truly unique as no two made will ever be the same. If there is a particular shape you are after, please leave us a note and we will make the ring to the shape you desire. 

When ordering, please specify the following: 

- Your material of choice (9ct Yellow Gold / Rose Gold)
- Your Initial letter of choice (1 letter per ring, A - Z capital only)
- Select your accurate ring size from the option menu

Your ring will be Made to Order, so please allow up to 4 working days for production prior to shipping. 

Complimentary gift packaging is available, please let us know when you order!

name: Gold Encrusted Studs
description:
The perfect everyday studs! These 22ct gold plated sterling silver ear studs feature intricate granulations.

Your earrings will be Made to Order, it can take up to 5 working days.

All jewellery will arrive in one of our branded boxes, ready for gifting.

name: Skinny Textured Bangle
description:
Inspired by textures found by the sea side, these skinny bangles come in Sterling Silver, 22ct Gold plated Sterling Silver or 22ct Rose Gold plated Sterling Silver. This listing is for 1 bangle - please select your preferred colour from the available options. 

These bangles are adjustable, simply bend to fit your wrist. Over time through regular wear the bangles will harden and mould to the natural shape of your wrist.

Your bangle will be Made to Order, it can take up to 4 working days.

All jewellery will arrive in one of our branded boxes, ready for gifting.

name: London Blue Coral Studs
description:
These oxidised sterling silver earrings feature intricate coral-like encrustations accented by brilliant cut London Blue topaz.

Your earrings will be Made to Order, it can take up to 7 working days for production prior to shipping.

All jewellery will arrive in one of our branded boxes, ready for gifting.

name: Heritage Hoops
description:
Cast from branches collected from National Heritage trail walks along the Dorset coast. Great for day to night outfit transitions, these hoops are daily statement staples. They'll make even the plainest tee look glamorous.

Made to Order, please allow up to 6 working days for the hand production of your earrings prior to shipping. 

All jewellery will arrive boxed and ready for gifting.

name: Rose Gold Forage Ring
description:
Cast from a real twig found in the New Forest, this Sterling Silver ring has been coated in generous layers of 22ct Rose Gold. It holds a 2.5mm brilliant cut Pink Tourmaline in its center. 

As with all our pieces, if you would like this design made in different materials or gemstones, please get in touch for a bespoke quote.

Your ring will be Made to Order, it can take up to 7 working days for production prior to shipping. Please choose from available sizes.

All jewellery will arrive in one of our branded boxes, ready for gifting.

name: Gold Forage Ring
description:
Cast from a real twig found in the New Forest, this Sterling Silver ring has been coated in generous layers of 22ct Gold. It holds a 2.5mm brilliant cut White Sapphire in its center. 

As with all our pieces, if you would like this design made in different materials or gemstones, please get in touch for a bespoke quote.

Your ring will be Made to Order, it can take up to 7 working days for production prior to shipping. Please choose from available sizes.

All jewellery will arrive in one of our branded boxes, ready for gifting.

name: Silver Kelp Bracelet
description:
A playful and delicate bracelet of sterling silver chain adorned with kelp-like silver petals which have been individually hand forged. Closes with silver clasps.

The petals are very lightweight, making this bracelet a great everyday accessory to add a touch of sparkle to your day to day style.

These bracelets are Made to Order, you may specify a preferred custom chain length (circumference of your wrist or ankle) in the Note to Designer during check out - if unspecified we will make the bracelet to fit a 17cm circumference. 

Please allow up to 3 working days for production prior to shipping.

name: Little Fin Bracelet / Anklet
description:
A playful and delicate bracelet of 14ct gold filled chain adorned with little fin-like silver petals which have been individually hand forged. Closes with silver clasps.

The little fins are very lightweight, making this bracelet a great everyday accessory to add a touch of sparkle to your day to day style.

These bracelets are Made to Order, you may specify a preferred custom chain length (circumference of your wrist or ankle) in the Note to Designer during check out - if unspecified we will make the bracelet to fit a 17cm circumference. 

Please allow up to 3 working days for production prior to shipping.

name: Black Diamond Boardwalk Ring
description:
This chunky oxidised sterling silver ring feature 5 tiny brilliant cut black diamonds set in a column down one of the silver bars. 

Sand-blasted for a raw matte finish. 

Your ring will be Made to Order, it can take up to 7 working days. Please choose from available sizes.

All jewellery will arrive in one of our branded boxes, ready for gifting.

name: Diamond Boardwalk Ring
description:
This chunky sterling silver ring feature 5 tiny brilliant cut white diamonds set in a column down one of the silver bars. 

Sand-blasted for a raw matte finish. 

Your ring will be Made to Order, it can take up to 7 working days. Please choose from available sizes.

name: Interlocking Eden Rings Set
description:
This set of 3 Interlocking Eden Rings come in a unique wrapped design which is designed to interlock when stacked.

The 3 rings you receive will come in:
- Silver
- Oxidised Silver (Black)
- 22ct Gold Plated Silver (Yellow Gold)

Your ring will be Made to Order, it can take up to 8 working days. Please choose from available sizes.

All jewellery will arrive in one of our branded boxes, ready for gifting.

name: Gold Interlocking Eden Ring
description:
This 22ct gold plated sterling silver ring comes in a unique wrapped design which is slightly adjustable - carefully bend to suit slightly different sizes. 

Designed to Interlock when stacked with other Eden Rings, wear it alone or in multiple stacked layers for a unique look.

Your ring will be Made to Order, it can take up to 7 working days. Please choose from available sizes.

All jewellery will arrive in one of our branded boxes, ready for gifting.

description:

Your ring will be Made to Order, it can take up to 5 working days. Please choose from available sizes.

name: Wrapped Flint and Tinder Ring
description:
This sterling silver ring comes in a unique chunky wrapped design with parts coated in 22ct yellow gold and other parts lightly oxidised to a contrasting black patina. 

Due to its design, this ring looks different from different angles so it provides opportunities for varying looks when worn.

Your ring will be Made to Order, it can take up to 8 working days . Please choose from available sizes.

All jewellery will arrive in one of our branded boxes, ready for gifting.

name: Gold Kelp Ring
description:
22ct yellow gold plated sterling silver ring with organic texturing, finished to a raw matte effect. 

This ring is slightly adjustable, carefully bend to suit different sizes. Wear alone, over the knuckles, or stacked with other rings from our collection for a unique look. 

Your ring will be Made to Order, it can take up to 7 working days . Please choose from available sizes.

All jewellery will arrive in one of our branded boxes, ready for gifting.

name: Encrusted Tahitian Pearl Studs
description:
A pair of little hand domed sterling silver disc studs adorned with black Tahitian pearls. Oxidised and matte finished.

Each disc measures approx. 6mm x 6mm

Your earrings will be Made to Order, please allow up to 5 working days for production.

description:

description:

name: Encrusted Pearl Solitaire
description:
A sterling silver pearl solitaire featuring coral-like encrustations and a unique gradient oxidised finish.

Your ring will be Made to Order, it can take up to 6 working days. Please select your size from the available sizes.

All jewellery will arrive in one of our branded boxes, ready for gifting.

name: Encrusted Pearl Stacking Ring
description:
A sterling silver stacking ring featuring coral-like encrustations. Choose from Dark (black Tahitian pearl) or Light (ivory pearl) - please specify your choice in the Notes to Seller upon check out.

Your ring will be Made to Order, it can take up to 6 working days. Please select your size from the available sizes.

All jewellery will arrive in one of our branded boxes, ready for gifting.

name: Tahitian Pearl Solitaire
description:
A sterling silver black Tahitian pearl solitaire featuring coral-like encrustations and a unique gradient oxidised finish.

Your ring will be Made to Order, it can take up to 6 working days . Please choose from available sizes.

name: Encrusted Tahitian Pearl Ring
description:
A black Tahitian pearl surrounded by sterling silver encrustations and a unique gradient oxidised finish.

Your ring will be Made to Order, it can take up to 6 working days . Please choose from available sizes.

All jewellery will arrive in one of our branded boxes, ready for gifting.

name: Gold Twig Ring
description:
Cast from a real twig found in Victoria Park in 2010, this ring is made in 9ct yellow gold.

Made to Order in your own ring size, please choose from available sizes.

Also available in Sterling Silver / Oxidised Silver (black). If you are interested in ordering this ring in rose gold or white gold please get in touch and we can create a custom listing for you. 

All jewellery will arrive in one of our branded boxes, ready for gifting.

name: Encrusted Stacking Ring
description:
A delicate stacking ring featuring intricate coral-like granulation all around its band. 

Available in Sterling Silver / Oxidised Silver (black) / Gold Plated Silver - please specify your choice upon check out in Note to Designer.

Ready to Ship, please choose from available sizes. If your size is not available, your ring will be Made to Order. Please specify your size upon check out in Note to Designer.

All jewellery will arrive in one of our branded boxes, ready for gifting.

name: Coral Ring with Rainbow Moonstones
description:
A chunky 22ct gold plated silver statement ring featuring five faceted Rainbow Moonstones that change colour under different lighting displaying pearlescent hues from white to blue. 

Made to Order in your own ring size, please choose from available sizes. 

All jewellery will arrive in one of our branded boxes, ready for gifting.

name: Twig Stacking Ring Set
description: Cast from a real twig in sterling silver and satin matte finished, also available Polished. You will receive 1 plain and 1 oxidized twig stacking rings to form a starter set. Mix and match with other stacking rings for a unique look. This item is made-to-order, please expect 4-5 working days for production before shipping. Please specify your size through the Contact form. Rings pictured are size M (UK) or 6 (US)

name: Sterling Silver Twig Stacking Ring
description: Cast from a real twig in sterling silver and satin matte finished. You will receive 1 twig stacking ring with the purchase of this listing. This item is made-to-order, please expect 5-6 working days for production before shipping. Please specify your ring size through the Contact form. Rings pictured are size M (UK) or 6 (US)

name: Twig Stacking Ring
description: Cast from a real twig in sterling silver and satin matte finished, this ring features a 9ct gold setting holding a 3mm pink tourmaline stone as pictured. Also available in oxidized / polished finish. This item is made-to-order, please expect up to 12 working days for production before shipping. Please specify your size when ordering, through the Contact form. Ring pictured is a size M (UK) or 6 (US).

name: Twig Solitaire Ring
description: Cast from a real twig in sterling silver and satin matte finished, this ring features a 9ct gold setting holding a 5mm lemon quartz stone as pictured. Also available in oxidized / polished finish. This item is made-to-order, please expect up to 12 working days for production before shipping. Please specify your size when ordering, through the Contact form. Ring pictured is a size K (UK) or 5 1/8 (US).

name: Encrusted Little Studs
description: These sterling silver studs feature clusters of intricate coral-like granulation. Finished to a bright polish, they glint and reflect like little gemstones from afar. - Available in Dark or Light - Earring backs are supplied This item is ready to ship! and will arrive boxed. Free optional gift wrap is available upon purchase.

name: Silver Kelp Necklace
description:
Entirely formed and assembled by hand, these exquisitely delicate one of a kind necklaces are made of sterling silver adorned by sterling silver petals. 

Each petal has been meticulously textured individually to catch the light when worn; they shimmer as you move.

Wear alone or layered with our other necklaces for a unique look.

Made-to-Order: It takes the better part of an entire working day for us to create this beautiful necklace, so please allow up to 3 working days for us to complete yours before we can ship it.

Chain length (taken flat) is approximately 52cm, petals vary up to 2cm in length. If you would like this necklace to be made longer, please select length from available options.

name: Gold Kelp Necklace
description:
Entirely formed and assembled by hand, these exquisitely delicate one of a kind necklaces are made of sterling silver adorned by 9ct yellow gold petals. 

Each petal has been meticulously textured individually to catch the light when worn; they shimmer as you move.

Wear alone or layered with our other necklaces for a unique look.

Made-to-Order: It takes the better part of an entire working day for us to create this beautiful necklace, so please allow up to 3 working days for us to complete yours before we can ship it.

Chain length (taken flat) is approximately 50cm, petals vary up to 1.8cm in length. If you would like this necklace to be made longer, please select length from available options.

name: Custom Listing
description:
This is a custom listing for Dr. Patrick Harrington:

1 x custom engagement ring in 9ct yellow gold with 9ct white gold claw setting holding an oval blue / green sapphire

Details of the design have been discussed and agreed on by email.

It will take up to 7 working days to create this custom ring before shipping.

name: Custom Listing III
description:
This is a custom listing for Melehane Girerd, if you are not her please do not purchase this listing

This listing is for the repair service of 1 x Quarry ring which requires 1 of the diamonds replaced.

name: New Forest Earrings
description:
Cast from branches collected from the New Forest, these earrings are versatile and easy to wear.

Fastens with hooks to the back of the earrings. We can also make these with earring-posts instead if you prefer. If so, please remember to mention this in the Note to Designer box which will appear during checkout.

Made to Order, please allow up to 6 working days for the hand production of your earrings prior to shipping. 

All jewellery will arrive boxed and ready for gifting.
